EmailTemplate.description: US-0011429 - [PT] Email Notification to Internal users when Call outcome is updated
EmailTemplate.name: UK Call Rescheduled by Seller Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!BoB_Seller__c.Seller_Name__c} has rescheduled their call.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!BoB_Seller__c.Account_Manager__c}
Your seller ({!BoB_Seller__c.Seller_Name__c}) has rescheduled their call to ({!BoB_Seller__c.Next_Call_Schedule_Date__c} {!BoB_Seller__c.Next_Call_Time__c}).
Please review the cohort seller record ({!BoB_Seller__c.Link}) and adjust your workload accordingly.
Thank you, HIVE.
